form-error-message.message: There was an error and your message probably didn't get to us, sorry. Please try later or contact us directly by e-mail

form-input-error-email.message: Please enter a valid email address.

form-error-empty.message: Please fill out the form entirely to be able to send it.

form-input-error-filesize.message: Your file size is larger than %dMB.

form-input-error-accept.message: Your file is invalid. Allowed files are %s.
